dict.acceptation: 老板，上司；领袖，首领；[机]轴套，套筒；

sent.orig: BOSS is support system of the integration, information resource sharing for the network carriers.
sent.trans: BOSS是网络运营商的一体化、信息资源共享的支持系统。

sent.orig: Like lightning game. With three- , three BOSS use of multiple inheritance. Code modular.
sent.trans: 仿雷电游戏。设有三关，三个BOSS采用多重继承。代码模块化。

sent.orig: Help face box tower climb to PK big BOSS, tree towers, stone pagodas, ice tower, tower!
sent.trans: 帮助囧脸方块爬上高塔去PK大BOSS,树塔，石塔，冰塔，钢塔！

sent.orig: Boss: How to think like a soldier?
The security in operating the BOSS system is the key to the success in the competition.
sent.trans: 而BOSS系统能否保证安全运行，又成为竞争成败的关键。
